overview.roleDetails: Owner of 10-person web studio, eZ Publish development, hosting services

companies.name: Aitweb
companies.description: Web studio specializing in eZ Publish CMS development and hosting services for universities and local businesses in Kherson.

companies.name: Kherson National Technical University (KNTU)
companies.description: Major university in Kherson, primary client for web development and hosting infrastructure.

description.short: Web studio building 50+ landing pages using eZ Publish CMS for universities and local companies, with hosting services.
description.full: Aitweb was a web studio I founded and operated in Kherson, Ukraine from 2011-2012. With a team of 10 employees, we specialized in developing landing pages and web applications using eZ Publish - an enterprise-grade PHP CMS framework. Our primary client was Kherson National Technical University (KNTU), for whom we maintained the university's web ecosystem and various departmental subdomains. We also provided hosting services through the URAN (Ukrainian Research and Academic Network) infrastructure. The studio built 50+ landing pages for local companies while also supporting the Kherson State Maritime Academy's Moodle e-learning platform.

howItWorked.description: Deploy on URAN academic network infrastructure for high-speed connectivity

howItWorked.title: Maintenance
howItWorked.description: Ongoing support, updates, and hosting management

challenge.context: Local universities and businesses in Kherson needed professional web presence and reliable hosting, but lacked technical expertise for enterprise-grade solutions.
challenge.response: Founded web studio with 10 employees, specialized in eZ Publish CMS which was more sophisticated than typical WordPress/Joomla shops, and leveraged academic network infrastructure for hosting.
details: Specialized in enterprise eZ Publish CMS

achievements.title: 50+ Landing Pages Built
achievements.problem: Local companies needed professional web presence but lacked technical resources.
achievements.solution: Delivered 50+ landing pages using eZ Publish CMS for local businesses and institutions.

achievements.title: eZ Publish CMS Specialization
achievements.problem: Most local studios used basic WordPress/Joomla, lacking enterprise capabilities.
achievements.solution: Specialized in eZ Publish - enterprise PHP framework with advanced content modeling.

achievements.title: 10-Person Team Management
achievements.problem: Scaling web development services required building and managing a team.
achievements.solution: Built and led a 10-person web studio handling development, design, and hosting.

achievements.title: Academic Network Hosting
achievements.problem: Universities needed reliable, high-speed hosting for web portals and e-learning.
achievements.solution: Provided hosting services through URAN academic network with dedicated IP infrastructure.

seo.title: Aitweb - Founder & Web Developer | Denys Honcharenko
